ControlHintDef.description: Vehicle SoftDeath Or Health < 10% - has ejector seat - EJECT
Helmet Visor Needs Wiping - WIPE VISOR
Turret Has Missiles - Ship in SCM: Missile O.Mode. - LAUNCH MISSILE
Mining Mode - Turret Has Mining Laser - Power On - FIRE (TOGGLE)
Locked Target: Hostile - Turret Has Guns - Ship in SCM:Combat - Ship Has gun group 1 & 2 - FIRE (mouse1 & 2)
Locked Target: Hostile - Turret Has Guns - Ship in SCM:Combat - Ship Has gun group 1 - FIRE (mouse1)
Locked Target: Hostile - Turret Has Guns - Ship in SCM:Combat - Ship Has gun group 2 - FIRE (mouse2)
Power Off OR Landed + Power On + At reserved landed pad - POWER TOGGLE
Turret Has Missiles - Ship in SCM: Missile OM - MISSILE CYCLE
Locked Target: Hostile or Attacker - Turret Has Missiles - Ship in SCM OR - Missile OM + No Missiles - MISSILE MODE
Current Select Target: Attacker - No or Friendly Locked Target - LOCK TARGET
Current Select Target: Hostile - No or Friendly Locked Target - LOCK TARGET
Attacker Contact Soft Select - No Current Attacker or Hostile Target - LOCK ATTACKER TARGET
Hostile Contacts Present - No Current Hostile Target - LOCK HOSTILE TARGET
Current Select Target - No Locked Target - LOCK TARGET
Power Off - INTERACT (POWER ON)
Power On - Turret Has Guns - FIRE MODE + GYRO MODE
Base - INTERACT / LOOK
Vehicle SoftDeath Or Health < 10% - Seat exits to interior - EXIT SEAT
Vehicle SoftDeath Or Health < 10% - Seat exits to exterior - EXIT VEHICLE
Ship Has Missiles - Ship in SCM: Missile OM - +MAX MISSILES and RESET MISSILE COUNT
Mining Mode - Power On -Turret Has Mining Laser - Fracture Mode - LASTER TYPE (EXTRACT)
Mining Mode - Power On - Extract Mode - LASTER TYPE (FRACTURE)
Mining Mode - Power On - Turret has guns or missiles - EXIT MINING MODE
Base - Seat exits to interior - EXIT SEAT
Base - Seat exits to exterior - EXIT VEHICLE
